baseRule.text: 若比丘尼著寶腰絡。波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 156

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī itthālaṅkāraṁ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 87

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber Frauenschmuck trägt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni wear a women’s ornament, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang mengenakan sebuah hiasan wanita, itu harus di akui.

partialParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，畜婦女莊嚴身具，除時因緣，波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 157

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼著腰絡。波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 147

partialParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼畜假髻莊具者。波逸底迦。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 180
